message: Let's split this fairly. I'm offering you 400k. Take it or leave it, friend!
My turn! I'm being generous, don't let the money lose value!
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. Inflation is hitting me hard. I'm offering you 450k this time. What do you say?
Inflation is on your side to make a deal, Alice! Don't wait, or you'll lose more!
Alright Bob, it seems we're in a stalemate. Let's split it 50/50 this time. This is the best I can do, considering inflation. Take it, or we both get nothing.
